40953810.review: Босфайт оказался на редкость идиотским. Вполне возможно, что это я такой кретин, но он просто напросто сломал все впечатление от игры и выбесил, после пфтой попытки я просто выключил игру и снес её к чертям собачьим. НЕЛЬЗЯ так делать, уважаемые разработчики. Если вы решили сделать подобную механику, то будьте добры ОТРЕГУЛИРКУЙТЕ что бы Михаил чарджил в тот момент когда я нахожусь ВОЗЛЕ ворот, а не когда я в поле и он убегает в Е.Б.Е.Н.Я. Стою возле ворот и просто "напакливаю" камни, вокруг них, ибо Миша НЕ В СОСТОЯНИИ добросить камень до ворот и дамагнуть их, ровно миллиметра ему не хватает. Суть босфайта, убегай от одноразовых бочек, убегай от Михаила и камней которыми он в тебя бросаеться. Скапливай "брошенные камни" под воротами (дамага ворота не получают ибо михаил немощный который НЕ МОЖЕТ добросить камень до створок), после чего вновь убегай в поле и скапливай камни там (которые по итогу ВСЕ РАВНО скопяться под воротами как бы там ни было) Уворачивайся от Михаила который чарджит в пустоту, вместо того что бы чарджить в ворота. Су.ка. Повесьте за яйца и отодрите в очко того, кто делал механику босфайта. Н.А.Х.У.Й. убило все впечатление от этой замечательной игры. Она классная, они интересная, но босфайт делал дегенерат. Спасибо за внимание и проделанную вами работу.

40945059.review:
If you're wanting a cute, funny little game to waste half an hour on, this one's for you. It's a short little story about a little knight and his quest to show his honor and valor, as he... er.... "help" the citizens of the town! For a free game, the graphics are very smooth and nice to look at, though it does seem like only a demo due to its length.

Pros:
+easy gameplay
+loveable characters
+secrets!
+hack and slash anything you want
+honor and valor!

Cons:
-very short
-not a satisfying ending, left you wanting more
-limited storyline
-needs more chickens to fight -- I mean help

Overall a very good game!

Adorable art style, Magestic music, a compelling storyline and characters that you can form a deep emotional bond over. Even though this game is short, it's humours and genuinely gave me a few laughs. The combat is fun and easy (plus it's not restricted to certain areas like some games, meaning if you want o bash everything that exists, such as I did, you most certainly can!) I fully recommend this game and look forward to either a sequel or a longer game.

Fun for all. Allow "OH MY GOD, LOOK AT THIS KNIGHT!" To bring out your adventurous side. Just make sure to bring your Valour and your Honour!

40864982.review:
Alright, so before we get started, lemme just say it is a very short and sweet game.

You are a weird bird like creature (honestly, for the life of me, I can't put it into words) who thinks that the knights these days are not made up of the right stuff. Hence, armed with a steel bucket on your head, a wooden sword in your hand (wings?) and valor in your heart you set out to win people's heart.

Of course being a knight involve slapping scarecrows silly, beating up chickens (ahem ahem), getting stung by the bees, getting drunk and swatting away red devils silly and finally fighting face to face with a drunk russian who throws stones.

10/10 would play again.

40863180.review: This game is so amazing and so cute. I definetely reccomend this game to anyone who doesn't know what do and has about 10-15 minutes to spend. The only bad thing about this amazing game is how short it is. I was really sad when it ended because of how short it was and I wish it was even a little bit longer. I was really into the storyline and I just thought it was adorable!

Gratuit, ce petit jeu ne paie pas de mine et fait un service minimum pour une experience d’environ 20 minutes.
Succès de completion aisés, musique et bruitages corrects, graphismes mignons bien que minimalistes, et support manette convenable.

Pas de sauvegarde cloud ou de Français disponible cela dit, mais rien de méchant compte-tenu du concept ici.
Un dev à l’écoute sur les forums, très appréciable. Certains « jeux » payant feraient bien d’en prendre de la graine.

40774745.review:
Ce jeu est très bien réalisé et pensé, que ce soit pour l'histoire où l'on commande notre petit chevalier poussin voulant toujours aidé les autres mais qui ne fait que le contraire, ou les petits easter eggs éparpillés sur la carte. La musique style médiéval est simpliste et répétitive mais joyeuse tout au long de notre histoire, sauf avec les boss où elle est plus agitée. Les touches d'humour sont très agréables.

Comme bien d'autres, j'aimerai une deuxième partie, mais le studio de production fait déja du beau travail.

Pour cette taille de jeu et ce qui le compose, je l'évaluerai à 8,5/10.

Un petit jeu d'action aventure, franchement divertissant.
Très court, original, il est gratuit et permet de gagner 8 succès facilement.

Les graphismes dans un style cartoon, la musique, la narration et l'humour présent, tout est réussi.
Les effets (notamment lorsque l'on est saoul, ou les vibrations de la manette lors de l'affrontement avec le boss), apportent un plus au plaisir de jeu.
La prise en main est facile.
De quoi passer un bon moment.

An awsome, amazing game. Please play at least once.

\\ Personal Ratings \\

1. Graphics: 8/10 (for this type of indie games and genre).
2. Story: 7/10 (it was short but interesting).
3. Gameplay: 9/10 (lots of fun and comedy elements + there was many things to do).
4. Physics/ game mechanics: 8/10 (found no error in any movement or control or actions).
5. Difficulty to complete: 8/10 (quite tactical for completing + 3 secrets to get, of which 2 are easy to find, 1 is almost undetectable).

40554893.review:
In 20 minutes, you can get 100% achievements on this game. I'm sure that'll appeal to some.
Unfortunately, that's about the best I can say for it. 

The game starts off with a charm that promises to beat out other low-end indie RPGs, but the humor drops quickly, the game forces you into combat that its frustratingly clunky mechanics just can't handle, and the narrative goes nowhere. 
By the end, a concept that, with work, could have made for an easily recommendable game, ends up being wasted, and all we're left with is another example of the poorly presented games found on Flash game sites. Which I suppose means it's still a better game'n most of the stuff that hits Steam..

Anyway, it's a very quick run-through with easy achievements and a bit of honest charm. It's also frustrating and will leave you feeling dissatisfied. Up to you what to spend those 20 minutes on, but odds are you've got something in the backlog that'd a more appreciable use of your time.

40554874.review: Where can I start...THIS GAME IS AWESOME! The gameplay is emaculent comparable with big company gme but surpasses even them. The art is just breathtaking the different shades of green in the ground and trees really give the game it's flare and beauty, Jesus couldn't have done it better! The story in incomparable with any game I've ever seen! Don't even get me started on the character development the tension, and hardships the characters go through is more unpredictable and engrossing then life itself! The only complaint I have for this game is it makes all the other games look bad...It's really not fair honestly. 10/10 Ready for the sequel!!!

[h1]Hope it gets a sequel someday.[/h1]

OH MY GOD, LOOK AT THIS KNIGHT is a hilarious short journey where this bumbling well intentioned knight comes to town looking to uphold valor and honor. Ruining these poor people's lives under the false belief that you're doing good was really fun and a concept that I feel hasn't been done enough. 

Worth looking into.

40495577.review:
This is a short little game in which you play as a bird who once day decided that knights were needed in the world, and so embarked on a quest to become the best knight ever. In doing so, you'll beat up scarecrows, chickens, and cabbages. Typical knight stuff. There isn't much more to say about this game; you can finish it rather quickly, and other than missing some of the secrets (which aren't many), there's not much else to do after finishing it.

Do I still recommend it? Sure, it's fun for its short lenght, and it has some achievements.

40494570.review: Its a funny and quick game but some of the secret achievements are hard to get without a guide .-.

40492458.review:
A short, but so very sweet game.

The game is full of humour and wit, that go great with a simple and effective artstyle with equally simple controls.
While there isn't a lot of gameplay to spend hours on, the gameplay that is there is quite fun and will keep you entertained.

I will admit the game made me laugh multiple times and I enjoyed the short time i had with it, would recommend.

PLEASE don't interrupt me...

40488261.review: Когда друг рассказал мне об этой игре, я сначала подумал, что не стоит тратить свое время на эту поделку. Но потом я украдкой взглянул на страницу в магазине, нажал кнопку "Установить", и... ЭТО БОЖЕСТВЕННО. Несколько классных квестов, смешной главный герой, похожий на цыпленка, МИХАИЛА, который сам же, проломив ворота камнем или своим телом, уж как повезет, поможет вам сбежать из деревни и речь "рыцаря" в конце игры, которая заставляет задуматься о том, что же такое честь и достоинство.

40478964.review:
Short, kinda cute free game where you run around as a silly chicky-chicky-цып-цып-цып and whack whack whack with wooden sword at all the evil like a knight. Dreaming of valor, honor and falling under ice, I bet. Probably made by an amateur programmer. Frankly, it feels like something that fits Newsground more. Or what was the name of that Flash site.

Though eh, as cute as it is, it could have been better if it had a fairy/child tale moral to it, not just main hero staying dumb. Didn't approve of a drunk priest either. Not sure, just feels too low, too obvious of a joke? Probably because I am getting more respect toward Pravoslavie as I mature up.

Game appeared to be designed for gamepad but apparently not. No x-input support, just d-input and even then hero kept looking at where cursor of my mouse was, so eh.

40420820.review:
[h1]OH MY GOD, LOOK AT THIS KNIGHT[/h1]

[code]Время напомнить им, кто такой настоящий рыцарь.[/code]

Отличная БЕСПЛАТНАЯ игра. Со своим юмором, правда очень короткая.

История  рыцаря, доблестного и смелого рыцаря! Он помогал жителям, ну, как помогал. Считал, что помогает. Спасал жителей деревни от пугал, передавил всю капусту, выпил с Батюшкой, после чего навалял исчадиям Ада.

Классная рисовка. Хорошие диалоги. Бесплатная. Что еще надо?

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Как говорится в описании к игре, испытайте, возможно, самые героические 15 минут в своей жизни. Рекомендую!

40400978.review:
Nice little game, very short but amusing. Started off as if you were a knight trying to help out in your village. but you are just a person causing more problems thinking youre doing the right thing 

[ 7.5 ] - Ambience/Charm
[ 7 ] - Gameplay
[ 4 ] - Story
[ 6.5 ] - Music
[ 6 ] - Visuals

Overall great but the end fight was a bit infuriating, - you have no indication of health so you dont know how many times more you can be hit, the rocks he throws are always just slightly too far away from hitting the door, the rocks seem like they are hitting the door whilst they aren't, it is very hard to see any rocks beside the door so you dont know if he can run in there and destroy you with them, there is no way to steer the Boss Into the door (he will run in the direction he started charging at). There is also one more problem, the screen, i don't know if it is only in my game but i am locked into a fullscreen window with two giant black bars on the sides of my screen, i feel like i was seeing much less than i shouldve been, it felt kind of sickening with this enclosed screen i was playing in. Other than that it is a pretty good game, you get to kill chickens and drink Wine with a Preist

이웃과의 단절된 삶.
남의 도움없이 스스로 하려고만 하는 현대인
그리고 모든것을 독차지하려는 욕심까지.
이 모든것을 내포하고 있는 이 게임은 
얼마나 이 사회가 이면적인 모습을 보여주는지, 그 끝은 어디인지 잘 나타내주는 게임이라 할 수 있습니다.
이러한 규율을 무너뜨리려고 마을에 등장한 나이트 chan의 행동 하나하나는 마을 주민들의  마음을 한번에 사로잡으며
결국은 마을의 부정적 상징물의 대상으로 불리는 대문을 부수는데 성공합니다..
이 대문은 다른 마을과의 소통과 교류를 차단하고 자신들것만 쓰고 다른 사회와의 소통을 거부하는 모든 행동을 의미합니다.
당신도 나이트 chan 과 함께 하시지 않겠습니까?

40319175.review:
[h1]OH MY GOD, LOOK AT THIS GAME![/h1]

[i]OH MY GOD, LOOK AT THIS KNIGHT[/i] is a satirical little game about someone who strives to become a heroic defender of the people and solving their problems...very "Link"-like, you know?  Except...this little birdy gets the wrong idea and takes things a little too far.  Be it smashing crops, killing chickens, or even destroying just-finished additions to one's property, this "knight" tries to be as knightly as possible...in his [strike]rampage[/strike] quest.

The soundtrack is humorous and the writing is excellent.  The graphics are minimalistic, but that's fair given that it's a game that'll only take about 10-20 minutes of your time to enjoy.  My only complaint gameplay-wise is that the church area's victory can sometimes be a matter of luck without any real way to tell if you're near-dead or not.

In the end, [i]OH MY GOD, LOOK AT THIS KNIGHT[/i] is a cute little game and I commend the developer for creating this game.  If you haven't checked it out, I urge you to do so.  It's free, won't take up much of your time, and has achievements.  Why are you still reading?  Try it now!

9/10  A cute little game about--wait, who are you?

???: Foul fiend!  Only rating a 9/10?!  You are a coward!

Umm...it's a fair rating...

???: I HAVE VALOUR!  I HAVE HONOR!  I AM THE KNIGHT!

It's actually a good rating that helps people acknowledge the dev's hard work, I don't see--

???:  HAVE AT THEE!!!!

*Shrodu has be chased off after being beaten mercilessly by a feathered imp's wooden sword*

40286049.review:
Taka sobie!

Opis naciągany jak oferty w telezakupach, ale nawet przyjemny gameplay. Szkoda, że Steam zezwala na umieszczanie gier z grafiką naprędce skleconą w Paincie przez ucznia podstawówki na kółku informatycznym. Gierka do zagrania, ale tylko jeżeli ktoś naprawdę nie ma co robić.

Gra średniawa, ale nie ma się do czego przyczepić (bo nic w niej nie ma)!

That's it!

Description as far as offers in teleshopping, but even pleasant gameplay. It is a pity that Steam allows the placement of games with graphics hastily assembled in Paint by a primary school student on a computerized circle. A game to play, but only if someone really has nothing to do.

The game is average, but there is nothing to cling to (because there is nothing in it)!

40282908.review:
Join this Knight on his journey to unleash chaos, yeah that's right, you are not helping people, but making them hate You. 
Help people destroy their cabbages, kill their chicken or both, get drunk and kill imaginary devils. While you did this heroic actions villagers will try to kill you by a creature who can throw stones at you and run towards while you standing at gates waiting for him to destroy, so You can run away like a coward, and then get depressed for running away. 

[h1]Funny story, easy beatable, easy achievements,[/h1]

Controls are very simple, and the story is quite funny. Worth playing as it only takes 10 minutes to beat and to unlock all achievements.

40265573.review: OH MY GOD, LOOK AT THIS REVIEW

40265379.review:
[b]OH MY GOD, LOOK AT THIS KNIGHT[/b] es una divertida aunque muy breve aventura. Con un sencillo sentido del humor, personajes tiernos aunque con un lado oscuro bastante singular, te atrapa de principio a fin. 
Nuestro protagonista no era el héroe que ese pueblo necesitaba, pero si el que merecía. Es un buen juego para pasar el rato, sobre todo si disfrutas destrozando horrendos repollos y asesinando malvadas gallinas.

[i]Los verdaderos caballeros juegan con gamepads, pero los machos pelo en pecho lomo plateados juegan con teclado y mouse.[/i]
